fixes.name: Grado de intereres en modalidad
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR val = 'TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Valores de campo de tabla dinámica]
RETURN
IF(
    val = "1" || val = "2" || val = "3" || val = "4",
    INT(VALUE(val)),
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level transformation that checks the row value of 'Valores de campo de tabla dinámica' and returns the numeric integer for values "1" through "4". The Tableau IF/ELSEIF chain is converted to a DAX IF with logical ORs; the field reference was transformed to the 'TableName'[Column] format. VALUE() converts the string to number and INT() casts to integer. No aggregation or parameters are used, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
